long_description: When race day dawns cold and gusty, don the Westcomb Echo vest for men. Warm and windproof yet ultralight, this vest keeps you warm with Polartec(R) Alpha(R) fibers, and features stretch panels. Polartec Alpha insulation is highly durable and very stable, enabling you to wear open-weave and more breathable fabrics under it without sacrificing core warmth. Breathable, 4-way-stretch Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) Pro extends down the sides and from under the arms to the upper back to aid ventilation during aerobic workouts. Featherweight nylon shell is windproof. Mandarin collar offers extra protection. Chest pocket zipper and two-way center front zipper are both laminated; hand pockets. Westcomb Echo vest packs down small for easy carrying.
short_description: When race day dawns cold and gusty, don the Westcomb Echo vest for men. Warm and windproof yet ultralight, this vest keeps you warm with Polartec(R) Alpha(R) fibers, and features stretch panels.
